title: How to let Chunghwa Telecom(Taiwan) support Wifi calling and VoLte
content:
I have applied for Wifi Calling and VoLte from Chunghwa Telecom. The previous phone can be used. But after switching to Google Pixel 3, this feature is gone.
I asked Chunghwa Telecom customer service, they said that this is a problem with Google Pixel 3, they will not provide support.
Can consumers only be so powerless?
How to do can let Chunghwa Telecom(Taiwan) support Wifi calling and VoLte ?
Thanks very much.
